item.title: All beginning is Haskell
item.description: Mathematical purity Haskell is a programming language that has gained popularity in recent years due to its focus on functional programming and mathematical concepts. As a language that emphasizes purity and immutability, Haskell is particularly well-suited to applications in mathematics, data analysis, and other areas where correctness and maintainability are critical. As a math enthusiast, I was naturally drawn to Haskell due to its roots in mathematical theory.
